@kohppy Well how would I know that? I don't even know their twitter. Also how is asking a legitimate question me being a cunt? If anything you're coming off more as an inconsiderate cunt for not assuming I didn't know their current situation.

@ConnerLikesCake I recommend nyaa if you know how to torrent (Google "sukebei nyaa"). Panda Chaika Moe is the most reliable when it comes to providing raw magazines and it's also more accessible because it's all DDL, but their tankoubon selection can be quite limited and the interface isn't great ( Doesn't show the cover), but that goes for nyaa too. rawdd dot com and hentai-zip dot net seem ok too. With a lot of these sites it helps to know how to type the name of the author in Japanese if you are looking for a tankoubon, because lot of the uploads are listed in Japanese only. If you don't have too many favourites I recommend sticking to major magazines like Kairakuten, Shitsurakuten, Bavel, Anthurium, Exe, X-Eros and Hotmilk and finding more authors.
